# (PART) R project in groups {-} 

# Mandatory R project {#sec-project}

## Learning outcomes {#lo-project}

By the end of this module, you are expected to have:

* Know how your group report is handed in.
* Know how to peergrade other groups report
* Collected the data needed for the report.
* Know the different elements the report must contain.
